name: Loudly Crying Face
baseMeaning: A yellow face with closed eyes and a wide open mouth, with tears streaming down.
tldr: Gen Z's preferred 'laughing' emoji. Can mean crying from laughter OR actual sadness.

Popular for expressing both hilarity and frustration.

generationalNotes.note: Primary meaning is laughter, not sadness. This replaced ðŸ˜‚ for Gen Z.

warnings.title: Dual meaning
warnings.description: Can mean either laughing or crying - context and generation determine interpretation.
